results.title: Metformin alleviates genetic and traumatic heterotopic ossification by inhibiting infiltration and mitochondrial metabolism of myeloid cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ alleviates @<m>DISEASE_Ossification_Heterotopic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009999 @@@genetic and traumatic heterotopic ossification@@@ by inhibiting infiltration and mitochondrial metabolism of myeloid cells.

citations.NLM: Fan H, Cheng Q, Lin K, Gong L, Kan C, Wang S, Zheng H. Metformin alleviates genetic and traumatic heterotopic ossification by inhibiting infiltration and mitochondrial metabolism of myeloid cells. Am J Transl Res. 2024;16(1):255-271. PMID: 38322576

results.title: Metformin attenuates trauma-induced heterotopic ossification via inhibition of Bone Morphogenetic Protein signalling
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuates @DISEASE_Wounds_and_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D014947 @@@trauma@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Ossification_Heterotopic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009999 @@@heterotopic ossification@@@ via inhibition of Bone Morphogenetic Protein signalling

results.title: Inhibition of NF-kappaB Signaling-Mediated Crosstalk Between Macrophages and Preosteoblasts by Metformin Alleviates Trauma-Induced Heterotopic Ossification.
results.text_hl: Inhibition of @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_18033 @@@NF-kappaB@@@ Signaling-Mediated Crosstalk Between Macrophages and Preosteoblasts by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Alleviates @DISEASE_Wounds_and_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D014947 @@@Trauma@@@-Induced @<m>DISEASE_Ossification_Heterotopic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009999 @@@Heterotopic Ossification@@@.

results.title: Pharmacological activation of SIRT1 by metformin prevented trauma-induced heterotopic ossification through inhibiting macrophage mediated inflammation.
results.text_hl: Therefore, this study aimed to investigate the preventive effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @DISEASE_Wounds_and_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D014947 @@@trauma@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Ossification_Heterotopic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009999 @@@HO@@@ progression, and unveil the underlying molecular mechanisms.

citations.NLM: Sun Z, Li J, Luo G, Liu W, He Y, Wang F, Qian Y, Fan C. Pharmacological activation of SIRT1 by metformin prevented trauma-induced heterotopic ossification through inhibiting macrophage mediated inflammation. Eur J Pharmacol. 2021 Oct 15;909():174386. PMID: 34332919
citations.BibTeX: @article{34332919, title={Pharmacological activation of SIRT1 by metformin prevented trauma-induced heterotopic ossification through inhibiting macrophage mediated inflammation.}, author={Sun Z and Li J and Luo G and Liu W and He Y and Wang F and Qian Y and Fan C}, journal={Eur J Pharmacol}, volume={909}, pages={174386}}

results.title: BMP and mTOR signaling in heterotopic ossification: Does their crosstalk provide therapeutic opportunities?
results.text_hl: We also discuss the activation of @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMP activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@) by the most widely used drug for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, which exerts a dual negative regulatory effect on @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ and @GENE_BMP1 @GENE_649 @@@BMP@@@ signaling, suggesting that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is a promising drug treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Ossification_Heterotopic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009999 @@@HO@@@.

citations.NLM: Wu J, Ren B, Shi F, Hua P, Lin H. BMP and mTOR signaling in heterotopic ossification: Does their crosstalk provide therapeutic opportunities? J Cell Biochem. 2019 Aug;120(8):12108-12122. PMID: 30989716
